hibernate-mapping.sql-query: select ll.lookup_list_id as driver_type_id, ll.lookup_list_code as driver_type from transport_hub.lookup_list ll left outer join transport_hub.lookup_list_category llc on llc.lookup_list_category_id = ll.lookup_list_category_id where (llc.lookup_list_category_code = 'DRIVER_TYPE') order by ll.lookup_list_code asc
